verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) How blessed <WH835> is everyone <WH3605> who fears <WH3372> the Lord, <WH3068> Who walks <WH1980> in His ways. <WH1870>
When <WH3588> you shall eat <WH398> of the fruit <WH3018> of your hands, <WH3709> You will be happy <WH835> and it will be well <WH2895> with you.
Your wife <WH802> shall be like a fruitful <WH6509> vine, <WH1612> Within <WH3411> your house, <WH1004> Your children <WH1121> like olive <WH2132> plants <WH8363> Around <WH5439> your table. <WH7979>
Behold, <WH2009> for thus <WH3651> shall the man <WH1397> be blessed <WH1288> Who fears <WH3372> the Lord. <WH3068>
The Lord <WH3068> bless <WH1288> you from Zion, <WH6726> And may you see <WH7200> the prosperity <WH2898> of Jerusalem <WH3389> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of your life. <WH9132>
Indeed, may you see <WH7200> your children <WH1121>'s children. Peace <WH7965> be upon Israel! <WH3478>
